product_name: CamelBak Kicker Hydration Snow Pack - Girls'
long_description: Whether carving-up bunny hills or big-time runs, this lift-friendly snow pack holds a two-way radio, snack and plenty of fluids, helping girls stay hydrated and happy for longer stints on the snow.
short_description: Whether carving-up bunny hills or big-time runs, this lift-friendly snow pack holds a two-way radio, snack and plenty of fluids, helping girls stay hydrated and happy for longer stints on the snow.
